sentences.sContent: The artificial reef, the Triangle, was put together from a freighter, a barge and -- this is the Palm Beach area, after all -- an old Rolls Royce.
sentences.sContent_eng: The artificial reef, the Triangle, was put together from a freighter, a barge and -- this is the Palm Beach area, after all -- an old Rolls Royce.
sentences.sCn: 人工鱼礁、百慕大三角通过货船和驳船装运相连在一起，中间的区域便是棕榈滩。 这卡片终究堪比“一辆古老的劳斯莱斯”。

trans.tranOther: a ship or aircraft that carries goods
